data:
HP 22es 21.5-Inch Monitor

LKR 23,500.00
  • » Model:HP 22es 21.5-Inch Monitor
  • » Other Features:>Display size (diagonal): 54.61 cm (21.5")
    >Display type: IPS W/ LED Backlight
    >Aspect ratio: 16:9
    >Native resolution: 1920 x 1080 @ 60 Hz
    >Pixel pitch: 0.247 mm
    >Display color: Up to 16.7 million colors supported
    >Brightness: 250 cd/m²
    >Contrast ratio: 1000:1 static / 10M:1 dynamic
    >View angle: 178° horizontal / 178° vertical
    >Response time: 7 ms gray to gray
    >Tilt and swivel angle: Tilt: -5 to +25°
    >Display scan frequency (horizontal): Up to 80 kHz
    >Display scan frequency (vertical): Up to 60 Hz
    >Warranty: 3 Years
title: HP 22es 21.5-Inch Monitor
